name: Soldier in the darkness
description:
An island with a dense forest is known for not allowing visitors to leave it. Everyone who goes to the island will never come back, you will stay on the island to investigate this mystery, but you will discover that they have all become zombies.

You will have to kill at least 30 zombies and find the rescue, but it will not be an easy task, as you will only have one night of darkness to complete the mission.

Find ammo in the houses to kill the zombies and build the bridges to locate the rescue.

You will hear a siren every 3 minutes that will guide you to the rescue.

Want to know how the story continues?
A totally free DLC for those who buy this game will reveal what will happen to the world. Coming soon!!
